      • okToPlaceShipAt

        public boolean okToPlaceShipAt(int row,
                               int column,
                               boolean horizontal,
                               Ocean ocean)
        Determines if it is legal to place the ship at the given location.
        Parameters:
        row - The row number of the ship bow at which the ship will be placed.
        column - The column number of the ship bow at which the ship will be placed.
        horizontal - The orientation of the ship to be placed.
        ocean - The ocean in which the ship is placed.
        Returns:
        true if it is legal to place the ship at this location, and false otherwise.

        Parameters:

        column - The column number of the location
        Returns:

      • shootAt

        public boolean shootAt(int row,
                       int column)
        Fires a shot at a given location.
        Parameters:
        row - The row number of the location being shot.
        column - The column number of the location being shot.
        Returns:
        true if there is a ship afloat at the given location, and false otherwise.

      • isSunk

        public boolean isSunk()
        Determines if the ship has been sunk.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string corresponding to the status of the ship
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        "S" if the ship is shot, but still afloat, and "x" if the ship is sunk.
